titles.title: TASTEE Act of 2021
A bill to prohibit Federal agencies from establishing policies that prohibit the service of particular types of food in dining facilities of agencies.
TASTEE Act of 2021
Telling Agencies to Stop Tweaking what Employees Eat Act of 2021

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary:
Telling Agencies to Stop Tweaking what Employees Eat Act of 2021 or the TASTEE Act of 2021
This bill prohibits a federal agency, or a contractor of an agency, that provides food services to a dining facility of the agency from establishing a policy that prohibits serving a particular type of food.
